name: Sergio bataz
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hey my name is sergio and im applying because im really determined to get into the cannabis industry i already know so much and willing to learn so much more ive learned somethings about growing and almost know everything about sales i just hope i get a chance
experience: I recently started helping a friend take care of his bud plants waiting to learn how to harvest properly and have some experience selling it too so i hope thats a plus
